sn54.2:1.1: “Mendicants, when mindfulness of breathing is developed and cultivated it’s very fruitful and beneficial.
sn54.2:1.2: And how is mindfulness of breathing developed and cultivated to be very fruitful and beneficial?
sn54.2:1.3: It’s when a mendicant develops mindfulness of breathing together with the awakening factors of mindfulness,
sn54.2:1.4: investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion,
sn54.2:1.5: and equanimity, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
sn54.2:1.6: Mindfulness of breathing, when developed and cultivated in this way, is very fruitful and beneficial.”
